name: Prologue
desc: An idle waif with no prospects to speak of...

name: A tattered scroll
desc: You buy a strange scroll from a travelling peddlar. If you could only decipher the ancient runes.

name: Apprenticeship
title: apprentice
desc: After paying a small fee, you became apprenticed to a local wizard.

desc: Under your master's supervision, you manager to compile your very own book of spells.

name: Master Slain
desc: Your master was a fool. A quick murder in the dark put an end to their petty demands, and freed you to pursue your own interests.
